fields_of_interest: Environment, Climate Action, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: Giving advice for the high level expert group on sustainable finance, especially for the set-up of a label-system für SRI or ESG funds
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: GNG (Gesellschaft für Qualitätssicherung Nachhaltiger Geldanlagen) is responsible for operative activities around the quality of SRI. The role of GNG is to make an active contribution toward assuring the quality of sustainable investments in the German-speaking countries through the certification of financial products and the development of standards, methods and services. GNG mbH is a wholly-owned subsidiary of FNG e.V. and provides an appropriate range of services to support the goals of the industry association for sustainable investment in Germany, Austria, Liechtenstein and Switzerland. Further information can be found at www.g-ng.eu.
